Wed, 09 Oct 2024 02:15:54 +0000 A team of just seven athletes from the Wainui Surf Life Saving Club top scored in the junior ranks at the SLSNZ Pool Rescue Championships in Auckland. Back row (from left) are Zoe Keepa, Brooke Williams, Lucas Wang, Owen Booker and coach Dion Williams. Front: Liv Williams, Xavier Booker and Aaron Zhang.
